nodes.text: Bong Dazo, born Angelo Ty Dazo, was an artist, who penciled many Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic comics as well as The Force Unleashed graphic novel. He was born in Meycauayan, Bulacan in the Philippines. Before working on Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic, he was already working as an illustrator for their local comics and likewise introduced the first manga style in the Philippines in 1988 before working for Dark Horse on The Irregulars, written by Michael Reaves.
